alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Redwood, east central Yellow Medicine and west central Renville Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Echo, or 14 miles northwest of Redwood Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redwood Falls. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 76 and 77. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 73 and 75, and between mile markers 96 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
